mapper.select: select * from cuntao_county_gov_contract where county_id=#{countyId} and is_deleted='n'
select * from cuntao_county_gov_protocol where county_id=#{countyId} and is_deleted='n' and state='valid'
select * from cuntao_county_gov_contact where county_id=#{countyId} and is_deleted='n' order by id desc
select * from cuntao_county_office where county_id=#{countyId} and is_deleted='n'
select * from cainiao_county where county_id=#{countyId} and is_deleted='n'
select * from cuntao_county where org_id=#{orgId} and is_deleted='n'
mapper.update: update cuntao_county_gov_protocol set state='invalid',gmt_modified=now(),modifier=#{operator} where county_id=#{countyId} and state='valid' and is_deleted='n'
update cuntao_county_office set is_deleted='y',gmt_modified=now(),modifier=#{operator} where county_id=#{countyId} and is_deleted='n'
update cainiao_county set cainiao_county_id= #{caiNiaostationId} where county_id=#{countyId}
mapper.select:
SELECT state, count(0) as num FROM ( SELECT q1.*, q2.temp_full_id_path AS full_id_path, q2.temp_full_name_path AS full_name_path FROM cuntao_county q1,cuntao_org q2 WHERE q1.org_id = q2.id AND q1.is_deleted = 'n' AND q2.is_deleted = 'n'
and q1.state=#{condition.state}
and q1.name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.name}, '%')
and CONCAT(q2.temp_full_id_path,'/') like CONCAT(#{condition.fullIdPath}, '/%') ) AS a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM cuntao_county_gov_contract WHERE is_deleted = 'n' ) AS b ON a.id = b.county_id where 1=1 and b.gmt_protocol_end >= #{condition.protocolEndDateFrom} and b.gmt_protocol_end <= #{condition.protocolEndDateTo} group by state
